duties_responsibilities.duty: Sell company products and services via telephone & email
Keep customers informed about available services, supplies, prices and new products
Process customer orders and drive efficiency through key dealer prioritization
Assist customers with initial contact on technical service questions and product shortages
Meet established sales quotas in territory and participate in product training and sales meetings

education_certification.credential: Associate’s Degree or three (3) years related sales experience with high school diploma or GED
